content:
It says
The DiagnosticReport.category binding must support at a minimum the US Core DiagnosticReport Category Codes of
Cardiology, Radiology, and Pathology.

How are the EHRs categorize these clinical notes (reports)?
In our system (we are an HIE) we have Pathology and Radiology but Cardiology is partially under Imaging (Radiology), so are these 3 categories really used by EHRs?

thanks
